author: Robert Kindregan
title: Three endangered Asiatic Lion cubs born at Fota Wildlife Park | Newstalk
text: Three endangered lion cubs have been born at Fota Wildlife Park in Cork. The male Asiatic cubs were delivered on June 5th by six-year-old Arya, who recently returned from Helsinki Zoo and was previously part of the first lion litter ever born at the park. The cubs' father is eight-year-old Yali, considered the most genetically significant lion in the European Breeding Programme due to his rare DNA. Fota Wildlife Park lead ranger Julien Fonteneau said the cubs are vital to ‚Äúglobal efforts in preserving the Asiatic lion population‚Äù. ‚ÄúIn a first for Fota Wildlife Park, Yali was present at the birth of his three cubs. Normally, male lions do not attend the birth of their young," he said. "One of our team members here quipped that Yali is a very modern father." Mr Fonteneau praised Arya‚Äôs performance as a first-time mother, noting she is ‚Äúexcelling‚Äù and "very protective" of her cubs. ‚ÄúWe have been monitoring the cubs daily, and they all appear to be well-fed and active,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúShe has been caring for the cubs outdoors under the foliage and out of sight. ‚ÄúWhenever it rains, she carries them to the heated lion shelter, which our visitors know well. ‚ÄúWhile they are still very young and sleeping a lot, it is possible to catch a glimpse of them at the lion shelter.‚Äù Endangered lions The Asiatic lion is classified as endangered by the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) and inhabits only one remaining site in the world, the Gir Forest in India, which has an estimated population of around 500 to 600 lions. Fota Wildlife Park is calling on the public to help name the three male cubs - which can be done so by clicking here - for an opportunity to win one of three annual conservation passes. Main image: The three new born Asiatic Lion cubs recently born in Fota Wildlife Park. Photo. Darragh Kane

author: world today news
title: Halle Bailey Gives Birth to Baby Boy Named Halo ‚Äì Announcement Surprises Fans
text:
Halle Bailey became a mom. The American actress announced through her social networks that she recently gave birth to a boy, the result of her relationship with rapper Darryl Granberry Jr., popularly known as DDG.
The 23-year-old singer and songwriter also shared a
photo of her hand next to her baby‚Äôs, which he called Halo, on his Instagram account.
‚ÄúEven though we are just a few days away from the new year, the best thing that 2023 could have done for me was bring me my son. Welcome to the
world my Halo, the world is desperate to meet you,‚Äù he wrote to accompany the publication.
The actress, known for the live action The Little Mermaid, did not specify the exact date on which her baby was born, it is only known that it was at the end of 2023.
After the announcement of the birth of Halo, Bailey‚Äôs publication obtained hundreds of likes and congratulatory comments from her followers and personalities such as Nicky Minaj, Kylie Jenner, Winnie Harlow and Halle Berry.
Discreet pregnancy
The
news that Halle Bailey became a mother took everyone by surprise because the actress carried her entire pregnancy in secretlike many aspects of his personal life.
Last year, a follower suggested that she looked like she was pregnant because a feature on her face, specifically her nose, had changed and she got angry. ‚ÄúMy nose is what it is and I love it like that,‚Äù she answered, annoyed.
Rumors about the actress‚Äô pregnancy reached their peak in September 2023when Bailey attended the MTV VMAs in a flowing orange dress that hid her belly.
The baby is the result of Halle Bailey‚Äôs discreet relationship with rapper DDGwith whom she has been in a relationship since March 2022.
After the birth of Halo, the rapper also spoke out about it and dedicated some of the most tender words to the baby. ‚ÄúYou are the greatest blessing of my life. ‚ÄúI have never felt so in love before.‚Äù
Bailey‚Äôs best-known project is the live-action The Little Mermaid, which premiered in May of last year. Since it became known that the actress would play Princess Ariel, many were opposed; However, after the premiere of the Disney classic, critics and many fans applauded the actress‚Äôs work.
The actress‚Äô most recent work was in the film The Color Purple, an adaptation of the literary classic Alice Walker, which premiered in December. In 1985, director Steven Spielberg then brought it to the big screen.

Halle Bailey: Pregnancy confirmed in Santa Monica?

title: Lavoro Fai Cisl | Ottimo risultato l'accordo in Spied√¨ con aumento di premi welfare e partecipazione agli utili
text:
Lavoro Fai Cisl | Ottimo risultato l‚Äôaccordo in Spied√¨ con aumento di premi welfare e partecipazione agli utili
La Fai Cisl Abruzzo Molise annuncia un importante traguardo per i lavoratori della Spied√É¬¨, storica azienda abruzzese leader internazionale nella lavorazione di carne ovina. √ÉÀÜ stato firmato il nuovo accordo di secondo livello, valido dal 1√Ç¬∞ gennaio 2025 per tre anni, che prevede incrementi nei.

In questa notizia si parla di: cisl - accordo - spied√É¬¨ - lavoro
Fiom Cgil: "Illegittimo l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢accordo firmato alla Trigano". Fim Cisl al contrattacco - "L√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢accordo di prossimit√É firmato nel 2019 dalla Fim Cisl alla Trigano Spa √É¬® illegittimo". Lo annuncia Daniela Miniero, segretaria Fiom Cgil di Siena, mostrando il foglio con la sentenza pronunciata dalla Sezione Lavoro della Corte d√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢Appello di Firenze il 5 giugno.
Accordo Italia-Albania sui contributi: via libera alla totalizzazione. La Cisl Arezzo al fianco dei cittadini - Dal 1√Ç¬∞ luglio √É¬® entrato ufficialmente in vigore l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢accordo di sicurezza sociale tra Italia e Albania, che permette di sommare i contributi previdenziali versati nei due Paesi.
Polizia Locale, raggiunto l'accordo a Latina. La Cisl Fp: "Un patto sofferto" - E' stato annullato lo sciopero degli agenti della Polizia Locale di Latina dopo l'incontro e la sottoscrizione di un accordo, firmato nella serta di gioved√É¬¨ tra il sindaco e il direttore generale dell'ente, insieme ai sindacati.

author: UK News
title: 2023 was one of hottest and wettest years in Northern Ireland | Shropshire Star
text: Both Northern Ireland and Wales have now had consecutive warmest years on record, with 2023 topping their previous 2022 records. Last year was one of the hottest and also wettest years in Northern Ireland, according to the Met Office. It described 2023 as the second warmest on record for the UK as a whole. For Northern Ireland it was its respective warmest year in a series from 1884, third wettest year in a series from 1836, and also its wettest year since 2002. The Met Office said it expects the pattern of high temperature records to continue in the coming years as a result of human-induced climate change. Last year saw heatwaves in June and September as well as above average temperatures for eight of the 12 months of 2023. Both Northern Ireland and Wales have now had consecutive warmest years on record, with 2023 topping their previous 2022 records. Some 1,399.0mm of rain was provisionally recorded by the Met Office for Northern Ireland ‚Äì 21% more than average. Some of the heaviest rain came during storms Babet and Ciaran in the autumn which caused flooding across several counties. Met Office senior scientist Mike Kendon said: ‚ÄúDespite the mild conditions in the year, 2023 had more than its fair share of rain, with impactful storms like Babet and Ciaran also influencing the figures. ‚ÄúClimate projections suggest an increase in the frequency of hotter, drier summers and warmer, wetter winters, and we‚Äôve seen a generally warm and wet autumn and start to the 2023/2024 winter. ‚ÄúOverall, this has been another wet year for the UK with 11% more rainfall than average. ‚ÄúA warmer atmosphere has a greater capacity to hold moisture, so as our climate warms, we expect it to become wetter too and, while there is a large amount of annual variability, that trend is also apparent in the observations.‚Äù
